sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_gd_guidance.GuidanceRecommenderHandler</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Base class to implement a Hander that manages interaction of Guidance with it's recommenders.</description> <name>GuidanceRecommenderHandler</name> <script><![CDATA[var GuidanceRecommenderHandler = Class.create(); GuidanceRecommenderHandler.prototype = { initialize: function() {}, /* * This method identifies the recommender that handles this implementation. *Should be "GuidanceHistory.recommender". */ getId: function() { // No Op, needs to be implemented in extension. }, /* * This method tells if the current Guidance can be acted upon. *It calls recommender system methods to decide if guidance has not been acted by another user for same context. */ isGuidanceActionAllowed: function(recommender, recommendedBy) { return true; },
type: 'GuidanceRecommenderHandler' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-09-09 10:37:07</sys_created_on> <sys_id>254c324e77f1111063e8dbad6b5a99c4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>GuidanceRecommenderHandler</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Guided Decisions - Guidance" source="sn_gd_guidance">fd76ed5a3b570010119c870044efc470</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Guided Decisions - Guidance">fd76ed5a3b570010119c870044efc470</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_254c324e77f1111063e8dbad6b5a99c4</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-09-12 13:46:42</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
